title: Standard REST API Interface
description: A pattern for defining a standard REST API interface within a CALM architecture.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the API service.

port.description: The port number the API service listens on.

basePath.description: The base path for the API endpoints (e.g., /api/v1).

authentication.description: The authentication mechanism used by the API.

description.description: A brief description of the API's purpose.

version.description: The version string of the API (e.g., v1.0.0).
